post:
![](https://cablechief.com/clients/assets/img/logo.jpg)<br />
**Hello LowEndTalk!** This is Cable Chief Limited (England and Wales: 10077923). A fresh new VPS provider, offering OpenVZ plans from Ogden, Utah! 

Are your alarm bells ringing because it's all too new? Hopefully not, but here's a few things to calm your nerves:
<br />
<ul>
<li>Cable Chief Limited is a registered company in England and Wales.</li>
<li>We have a three-member team, no outsourcing, ever. </li>
<li>We are registered with the Information Commissioner's Office and abide by the Data Protection Act.</li>
<li>Our client area is SSL secured, as is our VPS Control Panel.</li>
<li>We offer a 14-day money back guarantee (see Terms of Service for more information).</li>
</ul>

Let's get down to business, here are the amazing offers exclusive to LET for our launch:

`VZ768
A cheap plan to get your feet wet!
2 CPU Cores
768MB RAM
20GB Disk Space (HDD)
750GB Gigabit Bandwidth
$2.49/month`
<a href="https://cablechief.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=5">Order now!</a>

`VZ2048
The LET classic, with a bit more.
3 CPU Cores
2GB RAM
50GB Disk Space (HDD)
2TB Gigabit Bandwidth
$4.99/month`
<a href="https://cablechief.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=3">Order now!</a>

`VZ4096
For all out madness, dive right into those resources, baby.
4 CPU Cores
4GB RAM
100GB Disk Space (HDD)
4TB Gigabit Bandwidth
$6.99/month`
<a href="https://cablechief.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=4">Order now!</a>

All VPS plans come with RAID10 storage, 1 IPv4 address (extra $1.25/month) and /112 (65,535) IPv6 addresses.

Want to test the network? Go ahead! 

`Network provided by GorillaServers, Ogden, Utah. 
Test IP: gs0.cablechief.com
Test file (1GB): gs0.cablechief.com/1gb.bin`

We accept PayPal and Stripe. All VPSs are provisioned instantly upon payment dependent on IP availability. Please read our <a href="https://cablechief.com/tosaup.html">ToS</a> before signing up, it benefits all of us!
